ARCONA Tabula Rasa

Brand: ARCONA

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Agua (Distilled Water), Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbadensis) Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana Extract (Witch Hazel), Lactic Acid, Geranium Maculatum (Geranium) Oil, Allantoin (Comfrey Root), Fumaric Acid, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract (Grape), Menthol
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
